name: Jump
summary: Jump (Alteration) aus dem AD&D 2e Player's Handbook.

source_text.raw_block:
Jump (Alteration)
Range: Touch
Components: V, S, M
Duration: Id3 rounds + 1 round/level
Casting Time: 1
Area of Effect: Creature touched
Saving Throw: None
The individual touched when this spell is I cast is empowered to leap once per round
for the e swll. Leaps can be up
